name: Strings of Divinity | Spell Plague Demo
name_original: Strings of Divinity | Spell Plague Demo
description:
Strings of Divinity | The Spell Plague is an open world RPG in which magic is corrupt and you must revert it back to normal. With the power of the Divine Lyre and help from a little companion, you can change history!

Game OST

This is a project we have been working on for awhile, and are constantly updating. Please let us know what you think of the demo, so it may help us in the future. Our goal is to finish the game by the end of this year and publish it to Steam.

! If you have played the game before, make sure to reset your save !

Controls :

WASD / Arrow Keys to Move

Enter / E to interact

X / ESC to open player menu

LShift to Sprint

Enter when in text to skip

Click when in shop to browse wares
